name: Wares 1092: Souheiden
overview: Based on the Japanese science fiction novel Wares 1092, a team consisting of a soldier, a monk amd others go to war using armored mecha who carry mighty swords in this strategy-RPG which takes place against a medieval backdrop. The limited edition of Seikoku 1092: Souheiden includes a metallic face mask and a set of beads which are packed inside a larger than normal cardboard packaging. The gameplay is the classic rpg style in which you have different kind of attacks actions in the battle and have to choose one of them, in the adventure part you walk around in a 2d world and have to talk to different characters to advance in the game.
